import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import IMG01 from '../../../assets/images/doctor-thumb-02.jpg'; // context import { UserConsumer } from "../../../context/user"; class EmployerSidebar extends Component { render() { return ( {(value) => { const { userLogout, user: { photo, name, birthDate, country_id } } = value; const photoUrl = photo ? `http://excodeteam.com/crs/public/images/${photo}` : IMG01; return (

{name}

{birthDate}
{country_id}
Dashboard Jobs My Employees {/* Message 23 */} Profile Settings Change Password Logout
); }} ) } } export default EmployerSidebar;
